means: 偷偷地行动：秘密、不显明地行动、发生或消失

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"偷，抢，夺"之意。
means: rob ： 最常用词，指用暴力恐吓或哄骗等非法手段抢夺财物。
steal ： 普通用词，指暗中行窃。
plunder ： 指大规模或大范围地掠夺。
deprive ： 多指夺去或扣留别人拥有或可能拥有的有价值或必需的东西，也可用于指抽象的事物。

word_mean: 侧支迂回：血流从正常的流程迂回分流，见于闭塞性动脉疾病

sentence.Network_en: They can steal away at night and join us.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们可以晚上偷偷溜出来和我们碰面。

sentence.Network_en: People who are drug addicts come in and steal.
During the riots hundreds of people seized the opportunity to steal property.
sentence.Network_cn: 在暴乱中成百上千的人纷纷趁机偷窃财物。

[海明威的《老人与海》词汇表] - 豆丁网 ... didn aux. v． did not 的缩写 steal vt. 偷， 偷窃 thank vt. 感谢.
徼字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 徼巡 jiàoxún 窃取,抄袭〖 steal〗 通“侥”。贪求不止〖 begreedyfor〗.
[体育英语]NBA篮球英语词汇英汉对照 ... scoring： 得分 steal： 抄截 three-point shot percentage： 三分球命中率.

动词（）away？_百度知道 ... send away 开除；撵走；解雇；让走开 steal away （把某物）偷走；溜掉 bear away 赢得；夺得；夺取…
网络周期挪用(Cycle Stealing):当你机构中的其他机器空闲的时候(如晚上),把它们暂用于网格处理。一台白天使用的业务工作站,晚上就可变为网格处理计算机。 全球周期.

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)rob or cheat someone in a comprehensive or merciless way
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)无情地抢劫；彻底地欺骗

jx.jx_en_mean: gain an advantage over (someone), typically by acting before they do
jx.jx_cn_mean: 占先机，抢先而获得优势

lj.lj_ly: stores that open on Sunday are stealing a march on their competitors.
lj.lj_ls: 星期天营业的商店比它们的竞争者更有优势。

jx.jx_en_mean: attract the most attention and praise
win praise for oneself by pre-empting someone else's attempt to impress
jx.jx_cn_mean: 在别人试图留下印象前赢得称赞

jx.jx_en_mean: To use, appropriate, or preempt the use of another's idea, especially to one's own advantage and without consent by the originator.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 强占：使用、强占或用先买权占有别人想法的使用权，尤指对自己有好处且未得到发明者同意的

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English stelan (verb), of Germanic origin; related to Dutch stelen and German stehlen

entry.def: If you steal something from someone, you take it away from them without their permission and without intending to return it.

example.ex: He was accused of stealing a small boy's bicycle...
example.tran: 他被指控偷了一个小男孩的自行车。

example.ex: Bridge stole the money from clients' accounts...
example.tran: 布里奇从客户的账户里偷了钱。

entry.def: If you steal someone else's ideas, you pretend that they are your own.

example.ex: A writer is suing director Steven Spielberg for allegedly stealing his film idea...
example.tran: 一名作家正控告导演史蒂文·斯皮尔伯格涉嫌剽窃了他的电影创意。

example.ex: His team solved the engineering problem by stealing an idea from nature.
example.tran: 他的团队从自然界获得灵感，解决了这个工程难题。

entry.def: If someone steals somewhere, they move there quietly, in a secret way.

example.ex: They can steal away at night and join us...
example.tran: 他们可以晚上偷偷溜出来和我们碰面。

example.ex: Leroy stole up the hall to the parlor.
example.tran: 勒罗伊偷偷穿过门厅走到客厅。

entry.def: If you describe something as a steal, you mean that it is very good value.

example.ex: At only £3.50, this champagne is a steal.
example.tran: 这瓶香槟酒只卖 3.50英镑，太便宜了。

sentences.sentence: "she got a bargain at the auction"
"the stock was a real buy at that price"

means.word_mean: 2. a stolen base; an instance in which a base runner advances safely during the delivery of a pitch (without the help of a hit or walk or passed ball or wild pitch)

sentences.sentence: "Someone stole my wallet on the train"
"This author stole entire paragraphs from my dissertation"
"The ship slipped away in the darkness"
"..stead of sneaking around spying on the neighbor's house"

auth_sentence.content: It's hard to prevent China steal intellectual property.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's hard to prevent China steal intellectual property.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's hard to prevent China steal intellectual property.

auth_sentence.content: I couldn't believe someone would steal a buggy.
auth_sentence.res_content: I couldn't believe someone would steal a buggy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I couldn't believe someone would steal a buggy.

auth_sentence.content: Or might "Weird Witnesses" steal the scene?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Or might "Weird Witnesses" steal the scene?

Sentence.sentence: Things get stolen when it is easy to steal them because they are left lying around unwatched.
Students have been complaining more and more about stolen property.
Radios, cell phones, bicycles, pocket calculators, and books have all been reported stolen
Some of the stolen goods may have landed here.
Other studies have shown that saddling employees with unrealistic goals can compel them to lie, cheat or steal.

sentences.en: Anyhow I must insist that you cannot steal.
sentences.cn: 不管怎么说, 你都不能偷东西。

sentences.en: Someone has stolen her purse when she was shopping.
sentences.cn: 她在购物时, 有人偷走了她的钱包。

means.word_mean: 悄悄地做, 悄悄地走

sentences.en: He stole cautiously around to the back door.
sentences.cn: 他小心翼翼地悄悄绕过后门。

jushi.english: When he studied in middle school, he was dismissed for stealing.
jushi.chinese: 他在中学读书时,因偷窃而被开除。

jushi.english: He stole cautiously around to the back door.
jushi.chinese: 他小心翼翼地偷偷绕过后门。

jushi.english: It is a crime to steal.
